actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to require the Federal Government to give proper consideration to the energy needs of all segments of the economy, including the travel and tourist industry.

summary.text: Requires the Federal Government to give proper consideration to the energy needs of all segments of the economy, including the travel and tourist industry, in the event any fuel allocation plan or other conservation measures are instituted.

titles.title: A resolution to require the Federal Government to give proper consideration to the energy needs of all segments of the economy, including the travel and tourist industry.
